With a brand new line up of servers, we are offering a hefty discount to help fill a bunch of brand new, empty servers! Up to 15% off for the lifetime discount on servers below can be taken advantage of. This discount applies to all configurations made to servers as well.

Each Server Comes With:
» Full Server Management w/ True 10-15 Minute Response Times!
» Wide variety of operating systems to choose from!
» IPMI: Allows you to remote reboot, reload, console your machine!
» Enterprise-level 100% uptime SLA on power and network availability
» Free Dedicated IP
» Supermicro Motherboard's and Enterprise Hardware! Don’t settle for cheap, old, unreliable servers!
» FREE 1 Hour Hardware Replacement SLA
» Free Transfer Assistance
» Adult Content - Allowed
» Generally online within 2-4 hours during business hours (8AM-5PM PST Mon-Friday)
